item.title: NFS Share
item.description: NFS Config File List Available NFS Share Re-Export NFS Share NFS Options NFS Config File /etc/exports List Available NFS Share exportfs -v Re-Export NFS Share exportfs -r NFS Options Squash means to destroy the power of the remote root user ro = read-only rw = read write root_squash = prevents remote root users from having superuser (root) priviledges on remote NFS-mounted volumes. no_root_squash = allows root user on the NFS client host to access NFS-mounted directory with the same rights and priviledges that the superuser would normally have.

item.title: Samba Share
item.description: Samba Config File Config Example Samba Config File /etc/samba/smb.conf Config Example [sambashare] comment = Samba on Ubuntu path = /home/username/sambashare read only = no browsable = yes force user = username force group = groupname create mask = 0640 force create mode 0640 directory mask = 0755 force directory mode = 0755 writable = yes valid users = username
